path: artifacts/Xiasi Inu Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.CoinToken: contracts/Xiasi Inu Full Smart Contract Security Audit/CoinToken

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Function `includeInReward()` uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the `_excluded` list, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges, including changing tax and liquidity fees, maximum transaction amount, excluding from fees, claiming all tokens, changing numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity, locking, and unlocking.
